description: The third generation of their iconic ski gains in camber what it loses in rigidity, keeping the same kind balance. A ski intended above all to surf the best powder, it features a rare asymmetrical design and is stable and reassuring at all speeds. For all the aesthetes of deep conditions. Beware, its special tips will be talked about in the lift line.
name: Nocta Skis 2023/24 - Mens
